__e: Please tell me someone has pointed out to you that magic doesn't come from sunshine and ice cream, for any of us.
A bit of sun, sea... and their other stuff.
Mum said my singing brought sunshine and happiness into her life.
You know, the thing with you is that, like, sometimes one eye is, like, cloudy, right? And the other one is, like, sunny. Like, cloudy, sunny, cloudy, sunny.
One kind word one full hug where you pressed me to your chest and held me tight would have been like the sun on my heart for a thousand years
We got a lot more sunshine today.
